Title: Psych
Actors: James Roday, Dulé Hill, Timothy Omundson, Corbin Bernsen
Plot: A novice sleuth is hired by the police after he cons them into thinking he has psychic powers that help solve crimes. With this assistance of his reluctant best friend the duo take on a series of complicated cases.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 4 wins & 20 nominations.
